title: Bug 116786 - Library include does not store relative path
OB: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when a library is included in a report design.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a report design located at $project/test. 2. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
